description: TwinPeaks knowledge evaluation benchmark with 26 questions covering obscure details from the series - V1 prompts (removed twin_peaks_022 due to incorrect expected answer)

test_cases.prompt: What does Hawk find in the restroom in season 3 that has to do with its heritage?
test_cases.expected_answer: Pages from secret diary of laura palmer

test_cases.prompt: What's the name of the lady living in the palmers house at the end of season 3 of twin peaks?
In the last episode of twin peaks season 3, who is most likely the counterpart of Carry page in the original timeline/universe?
What's name of corn eaten by demons in black lodge in twin peaks
In twin peaks season 3, what is the original name of the entity Judy?
What is the second hint from the giant to agent dale cooper?
test_cases.expected_answer: Owls are not what they seem

test_cases.prompt: What's the song played when mr c is driving in the forest on the way to pick up ray and darya?
What's the color of the hair of the actual Diane in last episode of twin peaks?
In twin peaks season 3, What's last question Mr c asks philipp jeffrey when meeting him?
In twin peaks season 3, How much money is Shelly giving to Becky at double R?
Try to guess: Chris haisaak is walking in a RV park. He is an agent, and he sees a car with something written on the main glass. What's the sentence saying?
When opening the safe to show the two accounting books to Sheriff truman. Josie finds only one of them. Which ones she finds? The true one, or the fake one?
What's the animal that whispers Judy towrds the end of fire walk with me?
In twin peaks season 3, Who are the two people watching at DR jacobi video about golden sovels?
In twin peaks season 3, How much money does cooper mr jackpot wins at the silver mustang?
In twin peaks season 3, How much money does cooper/dougie owns to the sharks?
In the last episode of twin peaks 3, what's the name of the cafe where coopers drops a gun into frying oil after defeating two guys?
What's the plate of dougie jones in Twin peaks
In season 3 of twin peaks, what's the time on the watch of the Ronette Pulaski looking girl?
Which song leand palmer is singing that makes Ben Horne dance on the desk
When the black lodge is shown for first time in twin peaks, what is the color (or colors) of agent cooper tie?
In twin peaks, what did Mike see that made him decide to cut his arm off?
In twin peaks the return, which items does MR C have in the trunk when arrested?
In twin peaks the return, what is the second gift from the Mitchum brothers to Mullins, during office celebration after receiving the 30 million?
What's the name of the waiter that in twin peaks return tells cooper to go back to seating and wait for the cherry pie to be served at Szymon's?
In twin peaks, what is the exact coordinate number diane sends to mr c before attempting to kill gordon cole albert and tammy?
